    public class SuggestionBox
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SuggestBox
    A SuggestBox is a text box or text area which displays a pre-configured set of selections that match the user's input. Each SuggestBox is associated with a single SuggestOracle. The SuggestOracle is used to provide a set of selections given a specific query string.
    Version:
    1.0.
    Author:
    Ephesoft.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SuggestionBox

        public SuggestionBox()
        Initializes the SuggestBox with a default multiWordSuggestOracle. which will have empty set of suggestions.

      • SuggestionBox

        public SuggestionBox(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SuggestOracle oracle)
        Constructor for SuggestionBox. Creates a TextBox to use with this SuggestionBox.
        Parameters:
        oracle - the oracle for this SuggestBox

      • SuggestionBox

        public SuggestionBox(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SuggestOracle oracle,
             com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.ValueBoxBase<java.lang.String> box)
        Constructor for SuggestionBox. The text box will be removed from it's current location and wrapped by the SuggestionBox.
        Parameters:
        oracle - supplies suggestions based upon the current contents of the text widget
        box - the text widget
